name: Furballs
description:
Winner of the first GMS2 Beta Jam

International football has never been so silly.

Pick a team of four seasoned veterans, paint your flag, and write an inspiring national anthem. Lead your team to glorious victory and rub your opponents' noses in it.

Pit your wits against friends from around the world via P2P multiplayer and web invites, or trounce your mates face to face with local multiplayer

Matches are fun and frantic. In the world of adorable competitive team sports, there's no room for ruminating. Think fast! Or you might end up going home empty handed...

With thanks to...

YellowAfterLife for his wonderful WinDev extension

Kevin MacLeod, Felix Blume, and Oculus for sharing their noises

The gamemakerdevs Slack team

Liam, Jon, Nate, and Sam

Reminder - the source code is licensed as All Rights Reserved. Please use this as a teaching tool (we're happy to answer questions) and not as a basis for a clone.
